channel.title: How to Disable item dropping
channel.description: Hey i was having a problem on how to disable dropping items. By this i mean that you cannot drop any items at all, or if you can drop them, they would disappear when the touch the ground. Could someone please leave me codes for this and tell me where i need to go in my source to do this? Thanks.

item.title: How to Disable item dropping
item.dc:creator: @mod_mortl mod mortl
item.description:
@mod_mortl wrote:

go to ur source and look for where it says someone cant trade its in client or server and delete that

Read full topic
